label: Holonomy Parameter k_gimel
mathematical_goal: Derive the holonomy warp factor k_gimel = b3/2 + 1/pi = 12.31831 from G2 geometry
theoretical_significance: The holonomy parameter k_gimel = 12.31831 characterizes the warp factor of the G2 compactification. Its derivation k_gimel = b3/2 + 1/pi = 12 + 0.31831 combines the discrete topological contribution (b3/2 = 12) with a continuous geometric correction (1/pi). This parameter appears in: (1) Neutrino mass sum: Sum(m_nu) = k_gimel/(2*pi*b3), (2) Fine structure constant: 1/alpha involves k_gimel, (3) KK mass gap: M_KK ~ 1/(k_gimel * l_Pl).
